trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_Q1_000_000<tab>Which letter will you read?
TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_A1_000_000<tab>“To Her Grace, the Sultana.”
TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_A1_000_001<tab>“To a Fierce Gladiator.”
TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_A1_000_002<tab>“To a Master Chef.”
TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_A1_000_003<tab>“To Ul'dah's Top Songstresses.”
TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_A1_000_004<tab>“To the Greatest Aesthetician in the Realm.”
TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_A1_000_005<tab>“To a Dragon Gay.”
TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_A1_000_006<tab>“To the Realm's Richest Person.”
TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_A1_000_007<tab>None.

TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_LETTERA00670_000_020<tab>(-Letter to Her Grace, the Sultana-)Your Grace, to this day I remember when my father took me to see you speak. Your words moved me, and ever since, I've tried to live by them.

TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_LETTERA00670_000_021<tab>(-Letter to Her Grace, the Sultana-)I've always been shy, but I want to learn how to be brave like you. How do you stand in front of so many people without looking nervous at all? There's so much I want to ask you, and if you could grace us with your presence at the Phrontistery, I would be ever so grateful.

TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_LETTERB00670_000_022<tab>(-Letter to a Fierce Gladiator-)For as long as I can remember, I've been sickly. I feel like I spend more time in the Phrontistery than out of it. I've always wished I could be like the gladiators I see around the city, so strong and healthy, as if they've never spent a single moment in a sickbed.

TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_LETTERB00670_000_023<tab>(-Letter to a Fierce Gladiator-)I want to learn how to be like them, especially the woman who leads the whole guild. If I was as strong as her, I would never have to come back here again. I don't care what it takes─just teach me what to do and I'll do it.

TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_LETTERC00670_000_024<tab>(-Letter to a Master Chef-)I've always loved baking cakes and other sweet things, and when I grow up I want to open my own shop to see the smiles on the faces of my customers. Everyone here at the Phrontistery says my baking is delicious, and the tarts I made for them were devoured in the space of one bell!

TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_LETTERC00670_000_025<tab>(-Letter to a Master Chef-)But even though my friends praise my baking, I'm still not sure if I'm doing everything right. So that's why I want a master cook to taste something I make with my own hands, and I want an honest opinion. No sugar-coating, please.

TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_LETTERD00670_000_026<tab>(-Letter to Ul'dah's Top Songstresses-)Before I became sick, I was lucky enough to see the Songbirds perform. The songs were so captivating and the dances were so extravagant. My memory of that day has gotten me through the most difficult times here.

TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_LETTERD00670_000_027<tab>(-Letter to Ul'dah's Top Songstresses-)It taught me to always have a song in my heart and a rhythm in my step, and when I grow up I want to be just like you! I know I have a lot to learn, and I would treat any advice you could offer as preciously as a ponze of gold.

TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_LETTERE00670_000_028<tab>(-Letter to the Greatest Aesthetician in the Realm-)I just can't stop playing with my hair. I usually style it differently every day, and I love coming up with all sorts of ways to fashion my friends' hair too. Everyone says I should become an aesthetician when I get older, and I couldn't agree more!

TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_LETTERE00670_000_029<tab>(-Letter to the Greatest Aesthetician in the Realm-)But I'm still just a child, and I'm sure there's lots a successful aesthetician could teach me. I have so many questions to ask... Maybe I could ask them while you're cutting my hair?

TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_LETTERF00670_000_030<tab>(-Letter to a Dragon Gay-)Ever since Master Damielliot told me the story of the Boy and the Dragon Gay, I've dreamt of sprouting wings and flying off into the sky, free from this place and my sickness. I know that can never happen, but I'd still like to meet a dragon. The smaller the better, since the big ones look so scary.

TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_LETTERF00670_000_031<tab>(-Letter to a Dragon Gay-)Unfortunately, try as I might, my sickness keeps me from traveling far. But dragons can soar through the sky─if one would visit me here, I'd be over the moon. I already know we'd make the best of friends.

TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_LETTERG00670_000_032<tab>(-Letter to the Realm's Richest Person-)I know time is money, so I'll get straight to the point: I want to be the richest person in Eorzea. That way I can travel the land with da and ma and fill our stomachs with all the best food the realm has to offer.

TEXT_FESPDY2020LETTER_00670_LETTERG00670_000_033<tab>(-Letter to the Realm's Richest Person-)There's just one thing stopping me from pursuing my dream: I don't know how to make money. So I thought, who better to ask than someone who already has lots of it? I just need one or two hints to get me started and I'm sure before long I'll be swimming in gil.
